00460     void retranslateUi(QMainWindow *MainWindow)
00461     {
00462         MainWindow->setWindowTitle(QApplication::translate("MainWindow", "Tonatiuh", 0, QApplication::UnicodeUTF8));
00463         actionNew->setText(QApplication::translate("MainWindow", "&New", 0, QApplication::UnicodeUTF8));
00464         actionOpen->setText(QApplication::translate("MainWindow", "&Open ...", 0, QApplication::UnicodeUTF8));
